00120     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(sceneCount, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_SCENE_COUNT_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00121     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(currentScene, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_CURRENT_SCENE_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00122     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(currentGroup, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_CURRENT_GROUP_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x0000, 0xFFF7), \
00123     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(sceneValid, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_SCENE_VALID_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_BOOLEAN_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00124     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(nameSupport, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_NAME_SUPPORT_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_8BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID), \

00208 #define SCENES_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00209 { \
00210    .id = SCENES_CLUSTER_ID, \
00211    .options = { \
00212                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00213                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00214               }, \
00215    .attributesAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBTUES_AMOUNT, \
00216    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00217    .commandsAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00218    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00219 }
00220 
00221 #define SCENES_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00222 { \
00223    .id = SCENES_CLUSTER_ID, \
00224    .options = { \
00225                 .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00226                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00227               }, \
00228    .attributesAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00229    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00230    .commandsAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00231    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00232 }
00233 
00234 #define DEFINE_SCENES_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00235     SCENES_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)

00472 typedef struct PACK
00473 {
00474   struct PACK
00475   {
00476     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00477     uint8_t type;
00478     uint8_t properties;
00479     uint8_t value;
00480   } sceneCount;
00481 
00482   struct PACK
00483   {
00484     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00485     uint8_t type;
00486     uint8_t properties;
00487     uint8_t value;
00488   } currentScene;
00489 
00490   struct PACK
00491   {
00492     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00493     uint8_t type;
00494     uint8_t properties;
00495     uint16_t value;
00496     uint16_t minVal;
00497     uint16_t maxVal;
00498   } currentGroup;
00499 
00500   struct PACK
00501   {
00502     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00503     uint8_t type;
00504     uint8_t properties;
00505     bool value;
00506   } sceneValid;
00507 
00508   struct PACK
00509   {
00510     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00511     uint8_t type;
00512     uint8_t properties;
00513     uint8_t value;
00514   } nameSupport;
00515 
00516   struct PACK
00517   {
00518     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00519     uint8_t type;
00520     uint8_t properties;
00521     uint16_t value;
00522   } clusterVersion;
00523 
00524 } ZCL_SceneClusterServerAttributes_t;
00525

00667     ZCL_Status_t(*enhancedAddSceneResponseCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_EnhancedAddSceneResponse_t * payload);
00668   } enhancedAddSceneResponseCommand;
00669 
00670   struct
00671   {

00673     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
